name: LO-OP
description:
LO-OP have simple design and simple concept. Connect right amount of loops between each other and clear board to pass the level. Train your skills in this minimalist-design game that can eat your brain. Don't be so rude with your mental health and spend some time sleeping while not playing LO-OP.

Features:

  • Handcrafted levels
  • Minimalist design
  • Brain-training gameplay

Contact e-mail: contact@palenogames.ru
